<title level="1" right="Rules">[Volcanic Eruptions](/Rules.aspx?ID=658)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 519 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Volcanic eruptions can contain any combination of ash, lava bombs, lava flows, pyroclastic flows, and vents.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

name: Volcanic Eruptions
